website_summaries.verdict: A set of four beach buckets that are all shaped like sand castles.
pros: Kids can use these buckets to make easy sand castles
Not very large, but eight-inch base makes them easy to use for sand castles
cons: The four buckets come in different colors but are all the same style of castle

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: It’s exactly as shown. They are durable, but we got too caught up in the look and thinking we are getting 4 different castles to make. Really, it’s 4 of the same castle just in different colors. I was looking for more of a variety pack with a shovel to do with my children at the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: It’s awesome and works.
customer_reviews.text: It’s awesome is all I gotta say. Lol. Pair it with the mold for walls and you’re all set.
customer_reviews.author: The Mom Mess

customer_reviews.title: Perfect centerpiece.
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for a surf theme pediatric party centerpieces. I spray painted them flat khaki and a coat of textured sand paint for the effect. The beat party is the kids can eat the seashells and surf boards and have.a.bucket to play with at the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware ... handles don’t stay on the bucket!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a “goody bag” for my daughter’s birthday party. I figured it’s only 4 kids, so I’ll splurge a little, and get something a bit more fun than the average bucket. But .. .... what good is a bucket that makes a sandcastle if the handles can never stay on? And it’s ALL of them that have a problem too. Couldn’t send them back either as I needed them for the party in a couple of days, so I’m a bit disappointed to say the least. With all the goodies falling out of the buckets as the handles wouldn’t stay on, I ended up having to cellophane-wrap everything.
customer_reviews.author: Maria G.

customer_reviews.title: Really Great
customer_reviews.text: The buckets are so great!! Amazing addition to our beach trips. Love that they stack all together.
customer_reviews.author: Kstb

customer_reviews.title: Great products!
customer_reviews.text: So glad we bought these for our beach trip this year. My 5 and 2 year olds had so much fun making multiple sand castles using these. With the right amount of water and sand mixed, they were easy to use. Also great to use them as baskets!
customer_reviews.author: HS

customer_reviews.title: Sand Castle Building Kit
customer_reviews.text: I was very please with the speedy delivery of my Sand Castle Building Kit and my 2 year daughter and we both loved it . I know she'll have a great time at the beach but for now lots of fun in the backyard in her sandbox due to quarantining. They are stackable making it easier for storage. The Sand Castle Building Kit is just as described and shown. I really appreciate that the company email to thank me for my purchase and asked if we were satisfied. It is not often that you receive that from a large ticket item, especially an item for $14.99. Excellent customer service!!!
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Can’t wait to use these!
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used this yet as our vacation is a few weeks away, so I didn’t give a rating for durability but they’re thick and sturdy to the touch. These are cute and a great concept for “building” a sand castle cuz the castle is at the ready! Instead of a sand play set that we got for our youngest two, we got this for our 9 year old who loves legos so as to approach a more “mature” beach building experience - he is excited to play with it so we are already goals! Yay!
customer_reviews.author: david and alicia morgan

customer_reviews.title: Son loved them
customer_reviews.text: The product is just as described and shown. They are just simply sandcastles. What appreciate the most is that the company email to thank me for my purchase. It is not often that you receive that from a large ticket item, let alone an item under $20. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Lyle

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Loved the quality and detail! I used this for an ocean theme party and spray painted them.
customer_reviews.author: Mario Espinosa

customer_reviews.title: Using these to make a SPAM jello mold.
customer_reviews.text: I have a YouTube based cooking show, The Bachelor's Fridge, and I used these to make a SPAM gelatin mold of a sand castle. They worked out great as long as you can figure out how to support them upside down in the fridge.
customer_reviews.author: R.F. Knotts

customer_reviews.title: All the molds are the same. Wish they were 4 somewhat different shapes.
customer_reviews.text: My grandchildren had a great time playing at the beach with these castle-mold pails this past weekend. It’s a little tricky getting the four corner towers to come out well ( you must pack the corners tightly), but after a few practices castles it’s not bad! Lots of fun. NOTE: There are no shovels included in this set.
customer_reviews.author: S. Decker

customer_reviews.title: Cute castle beach toys
customer_reviews.text: We haven't used these beach toys yet but they look sturdy. My daughter can't wait to use them. I would recommend these because they are unique and seem to be good quality
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Serves the purpose
customer_reviews.text: They seem to be just what we want. Bought them for the grandchildren for a trip to the beach this summer, so haven't put them to use yet, but are bright, durable and look to make great sand castles
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: These sand toys were just as pictured. It's a good starter set; I also bought a set of sand molds that will make the walls to go between these. Good size for families making sand castles. Received quickly and in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: They arrived quickly. Good product. Good price. They are big and all the same which is why I got one for each of my children so they wouldn't fight over it. They are also a bucket so that's awesome to
customer_reviews.author: Erica Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic
customer_reviews.text: The castles come stacked together which I expected. But, when I pulled them apart, 1 of them cracked on the top. Its good enough for what I needed a castle for (craft display), but I wouldn't buy these for a child to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Florida GiGi

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: My kids loved playing with these at the beach, with that being said...I was hoping for the colors shown in the photos and instead we got some brightly colored buckets.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Great forms
customer_reviews.text: My Grandson loves the sandcastle molds. Very easy to use for a 2 year old. The former castle comes out very easy. I would like a set of different size castles, also.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Herman-Chesser

customer_reviews.title: Not made of cheap and flimsy material.
customer_reviews.text: Not made of cheap and flimsy material. It withstood a bunch of kids playing in a sand pit at a birthday party
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Ehimika

customer_reviews.title: That they are all the same design
customer_reviews.text: I should have paid more attention. I thought that they were all different design, a variety but they were all the same castle. Next time I’ll pay more attention. But a very good value for the money
customer_reviews.author: djAY

customer_reviews.title: Great sandbox toy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my grandkids' sandbox. They are sturdy and colorful. I will buy another set of them soon because unfortunately they are not dog proof. Ugh.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: They will be used to make ice castles that my class has to try to melt. It is for a STEM Lesson in my K-4 classroom. They were perfect! Many Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and fun for the
customer_reviews.text: plastic sandcastle molds. Rather large for preschoolers. sturdy and fun for the sandbox
customer_reviews.author: SMack

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful castles with minimal effort.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to create beautiful sand castles with these. My daughters love them. The plastic doesn't seem super strong, but so far they are holding up. Decent quality for the money.
customer_reviews.author: MommyNurse

customer_reviews.title: The sand comes out of the mold very easily and makes the exact shape with no breakage
customer_reviews.text: There are four of the same exact design. The sand comes out of the mold very easily and makes the exact shape with no breakage. They are very easy to use for all ages and look more dramatic than most other sand castle molds. I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTIE CAMPBELL

customer_reviews.title: Fun in The Sand with Real Sand Castles
customer_reviews.text: These are so much fun in the sand, pretty durable we have been using them in wet sand just fine so far and my boys love the fun sand castle shapes. They stack well for carrying and have handles.
customer_reviews.author: havah Fulson

customer_reviews.title: Cute but damaged
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these, which is the only reason I didn’t send them back because one was broken. Overall they serve their purpose.
customer_reviews.author: CarolineH

customer_reviews.title: Easy to remove your mold
customer_reviews.text: I bought them because of a Pinterest tutorial on making sandcastle cake but I also have 3 girls so the 4 pack was great. So we use them for a lot of different purposes!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Brush

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!!!
customer_reviews.text: My grandchildren were so excited to make castles in the sand with these molds! The shape came out perfectly and the colors were bright and pretty. Kept the kids busy for hours!!!

customer_reviews.title: Beach Fun

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy. Detail makes it difficult for a perfect castle

customer_reviews.title: 4.5! Great buckets/sand toy

But they were such a hit that it attracted other little kids to us and we were able to give 2 away! My son and his little friend loved them! The handles did pop off sometimes but it was the a huge flaw issue.

customer_reviews.title: These actually work!

They actually do stand up on their own (I had my doubts about that before buying) but you can make actual sand castles with these. So glad I bought them!

customer_reviews.text: Smaller than depicted. Quality is just okay with semi-medium to medium thickness. Seems overpriced for quality but overall served its purpose.

customer_reviews.title: and perfect for my grandkids to play with on the beach

product_meta.title: Sand Castle Building Kit, Beach Toys, Beach Bucket, Sand Castle Molds for Kids, Gift Toy for Ages 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9, Older Kids and Toddlers, Sandcastle Building Kit Pail for Kids
product_meta.description: Do you remember those days when you sat at the beach, trying to create your Sand Castle out of cups, buckets and beach pails. Those days are Long over! A child can create his or her own Sand Castle with a few scoops of sand into this unique Sand Castle bucket pail. These Sand Castle buckets are multipurpose beach pails. You can use it to carry items in it like water, sand, dinosaur moulds and other sand toys, besides for using these beach pails for your Sand Castle. Beach pails and beach balls used to be the only toys at the beach, but now you can add to your beach kit or modify your beach toys By adding these Sand Castle beach pails. These beach buckets can be played with in your parks sandbox or at the beach. The castle in the sand looks real, authentic, and neat as if you worked on the castle for hours. This set includes 4 different sand pail moulds with 4 different bright colours; Pink, Blue, green, and yellow. Each of the beach pails are 8 inches Made out of hard plastic making it easy to form a castle in the sand. This is an exciting and fun toy to play with to add to your sand toys or summer toys.
feature_bullets: Set of 4 sand castle molds beach pail buckets, pink, yellow, blue, and green.
2 in 1, perfect beach pails for kids, at the same time create beautiful castle molds with this sandcastle building kit.
Hard plastic castle buckets, easy to play with and easy stackable to put away.
measures: 8 inches, come in 4 bright colors, pink, yellow, blue, and green. set is 1 of each color
Great summer toy for boys and girls to play with at the beach or in the sandbox.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars774 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
